:::Wheeljack/Banzai-Tron:::

::He finds Zardus::
Wheeljack: Zardus, sir.
::he salutes::
Wheeljack: Composer and i are pleased to tell you that the new defenses are a 
success.  I sent out test drones to simulate an attack on the base, and now 
all of those test drones are destroyed.  The Iron Fist should now be able to 
ward off almost anything.
~~~~~
::Banzai-Tron evaded the bolt::
Banzai-Tron: Is that your best shot?
::He manuvers in the air and fires off 2 missles at Tigerhawk::

--part1_8.113cbafa.27d8d84b_boundary
